title: Rajeshwari Haaram: Emerald & Ruby Grandeur
materials: Sparkling CZ Diamonds. Features a luxurious Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This regal haaram features a graceful lattice design highlighted by CZ Diamonds that seamlessly transitions into floral emerald and ruby clusters. The center pendant showcases a captivating emerald surrounded by vibrant rubies, with delicate emerald drops suspended below. The intricate setting enhances the brilliance of each gemstone, offering a harmonious blend of traditional and contemporary aesthetics. The necklace showcases the meticulous craftsmanship associated with South Indian jewelry, with modern design flourishes.
colors: with vibrant pops of emerald green and ruby red. The white of the CZ diamonds provides a stunning contrast
occasions: and grand celebrations. Suitable for a Seemantham
or any occasion where you want to make a statement. Also a great modern piece to be worn on any special date.
description: A fusion of traditional South Indian craftsmanship with contemporary design, this haaram is a timeless heirloom. The use of high-quality emeralds and rubies signifies prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, making it a worthwhile investment for generations to come. Makes a stunning statement as well as the perfect bridal piece. The perfect piece to be worn by a Devadasis during poojas at temples.
